name: micronesia
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a region of the western Pacific that includes many islands and countries such as the Marshall Islands and the Federated States of Micronesia
(also the Federated States of Micronesia) a country in the western Pacific formed of four states that include over 600 islands
